onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.PutBackOnCha.translation: Please put Cozmo back on the charger.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message1.translation: You're connected to your Cozmo, and he's almost ready. He just needs a moment to charge.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message2.translation: Once he's done charging, let Cozmo come to life and learn about his new home.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message3.translation: Cozmo needs a caring owner. Care for his Needs each day, and he'll unlock new Games and Tricks.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message4.translation: You can pick up Cozmo if you need to, but he's happiest when he can drive on his own.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.message5.translation: When you let Cozmo be, he loves exploring the world on his own in Freeplay. He'll automatically request Games, do Tricks, and occasionally earn Sparks.

onboarding.CozmoNeedsCharge.finalMessage.translation: Cozmo is ready to play. To completely charge his battery, you can keep him on the charger for another 7 minutes.

onboarding.Slide2.translation:
Cozmo is a very special robot who needs a caring owner.

 Follow the instructions carefully!

onboarding.Phase3.Header1.translation: Place a Cube in front of Cozmo.

onboarding.Phase3.Body1.translation: It will turn <color=#00FFFF>blue</color> when he can see it.

onboarding.Phase3.Body2.translation: Great! If the Cube is too close, it's hard for Cozmo to see it.

onboarding.Phase3.Header3.translation: He'll tell you when he's ready to proceed...

onboarding.Phase3.Body3.translation: Let Cozmo inspect the Cube on his own.

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorCozmo.translation: Tutorial Paused Cozmo needs to be on a stable, flat, surface and to explore on his own.

onboarding.Phase3.ErrorFinal.translation: Having Trouble? Make sure Cozmo is on a flat, clean table. Cozmo may struggle on glass surfaces. If you're still having issues, visit support.anki.com on another device.

onboarding.Slide0a.translation: Put Cozmo on a clean, open table in a well-lit room.

onboarding.GreatPlaySpace2Footer.translation: Cozmo will try to avoid falling, but just like a pet, he might need your help.

onboarding.OldRobotSkip.translation: This Cozmo has already been through the Tutorial. Would you like to Skip it, or Start it again?

onboarding.MeetCozmoIntro.translation:
Well done!

Cozmo would like to meet you.

onboarding.NeedsIntro.translation: Cozmo has Needs. Care for him each day to keep him happy.

onboarding.NeedsIntroReturning.translation: Cozmo has Needs. Care for him each day to keep him happy. Cozmo's App may look a little different but you'll keep any unlocks you've earned.

onboarding.PlayIntro.translation: Cozmo needs to play. Tap the PLAY button to request Games or Tricks. Each day you fill his yellow bar you'll earn a Play Token.

onboarding.ActivitiesIntro.translation: Discover Activities are special and don't affect Cozmo’s Needs or cost Sparks.

onboarding.repair.ticker.translation: Cozmo wants to be tuned up...

onboarding.RepairIntro.translation: Cozmo needs a tune-up. When the red bar is low, tap the TUNE UP button to scan Cozmo.

onboarding.FeedIntro.translation: Cozmo needs to be fed. When the blue bar is low, it means Cozmo is hungry. Tap the FEED button.

onboarding.DoATrickDesc.translation: Cozmo is a playful robot and loves doing Tricks. Make sure there’s a Cube he can see, and then watch him roll it.

onboarding.RewardsIntro.Part2.translation:
Each day you fill his 
<color=#f5ea12>Play Need</color> you’ll earn a 
<color=#f5ea12>Play Token.</color>

onboarding.TokensIntro.Part1.translation: Fill Cozmo’s <color=#f5ea12>Play Need</color> on three days to unlock a <color=#f5ea12>Bonus Box.</color>

onboarding.TokensIntro.Part2.translation: Cozmo is lucky to have you as an owner! Time to explore together!

onboarding.notificationpreprompt.body.translation: Would you like Cozmo to send you messages when he needs you?
